Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Southbound Reroute near 111th/Halsted
ShortDescription: Southbound 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth,  119th, Halsted and 115th  due to, street blockage near 111th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via 115th, Wentworth,  119th, Halsted and 115th  due to, street blockage near 111th/Halsted.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Rosemont
ShortDescription: O'Hare bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to an animal on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare bound Blue Line trains are standing at Rosemont due to an animal on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Shuttle buses are requested from O'Hare to Jefferson Park to provide connecting service in both directions.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
